website_summaries.verdict: Go with this vacuum if you're looking for a compact yet powerful vacuum for your small home or apartment.
pros: Compact, lightweight vacuum that's easy to maneuver
Powerful enough to pick up pet hair and stuck-on debris
cons: The power cord is only 15 feet long
Small vacuum head means it takes longer to cover a large room

customer_reviews.title: PROS: -Picks up litter and pet fur -Lightweight and ...
customer_reviews.text: PROS: -Picks up litter and pet fur -Lightweight and compact -Great price CONS: -Smaller than I thought it would be -Wish cord was a little longer Please mark this review as 'helpful' it it assisted you in making a decision!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cleaning power.
customer_reviews.text: This little sweeper does an excellent job of picking up literally everything, dog hair, dust, little pieces of debris etc. The suction is powerful gets into corners beautifully and the filter is very easy to change and clean. I am especially amazed at the amount of dog hair it picks up. The photo is from one floor, my living room floor.
customer_reviews.author: G. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Very light, great suction
customer_reviews.text: It's so tiny and light and thin, you'd think it would be bad. But it's great! I bought it for work in a preschool classroom. We use it everyday over the carpet and tiled areas. It picks up really well and is so light its easy to move around, push, and swivel. My co worker liked it so much she bought one for her home. Need something light that works - this is it. Oh, and not having the brush has been great. We don't have to spend time every few days cutting all that hair out that would otherwise be wrapped around it. Wasn't sure it would work well without the brush, but it does.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Stair power
customer_reviews.text: This is not ment for big jobs! I have a dog and using it on the stairs is great...light weight and does a good job picking up the dirt and hair.you must empty frequently and the cord is not very long bit beats lugging the full size Kirby on the stairs.worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight Vacuum for hardwood floors
customer_reviews.text: This is a lightweight vacuum. If you’re using it on hardwood floors you will be find with it. If you plan on using it on carpet it is questionable. It would have to be a really thin carpet for it to somewhat work. If the carpet is thicker it doesn’t really work on it. I will really just keep this on our main floor where there is no carpet. Please note: When I write a review, I keep in mind that those reading are also looking for honesty about the product and want an unbiased opinion to go by. If my review has been helpful to you, please give me a “YES” vote on my review. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Allia

customer_reviews.title: Filters are NOWHERE to be found online!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about 6 months and i loved it while it lasted. I need to replace the filter and THEY DON"T MAKE THEM ANYMORE! Why is this a special for Prime customers if the model is being phased out and filters are unavailable. I bought the filters that "most people buy with this product" and they are too small! I can't even sell this at a garage sale. SOOOOOOOO DISAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.author: Marzen

customer_reviews.title: Worthless, save your money
customer_reviews.text: Almost worthless. Very little suction, my auto vacuum has more suction than this one. Very short cord limits use. Tried to use in area around bathroom cabinet and in closet, both with tile floor with limited success. Also, no where on the vacuum to keep the one crevice attachment that comes with it. Don't waste your money regardless of what the verified purchasers write. Update: tried on furniture with handheld portion only and did minimum pickup of cat hair on microfiber material and useless on material with texture.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer 13

customer_reviews.title: I hate to be negative
customer_reviews.text: Ugh, I hate to be negative. I knew it wouldn't have much power - I totally get that. But people need to know it's basically a dustbuster with a handle. Literally, that's all it is. It wouldn't pick up a piece of thread on the floor - that's how weak this thing is. It's a pretty color, that's the only nice thing I can say about it. I wish I'd saved my money and paid a little more for something that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Not much of a Vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't pick a thing up. I had to go back over my floor on my hands and knees and do the job I expected it to do. This is definitely not worth the $44 I paid. I'd suggest just getting a $20 vacuum cleaner. In that case, you know what to expect. It has very weak air suction.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! This little guy is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! This little guy is amazing, works great for dog hair and my small apartment. I have a doberman that sheds A LOT and it was always such a pain the try and sweep the hair out of corners and get behind the tv, but this little Bissell makes the clean up so easy. It's very light, so you can lift it to get those annoying cob webs and dust in the ceiling corners and hard to reach spots. I love how it can work as a regular push vacuum and a hand held. I would highly recommend for a small house/apartment and pet hair, may need an extension cord for larger rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Polturqkoi

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised to see so many positive reviews on ...
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised to see so many positive reviews on this vacuum. It does not work on carpet. It barely works on floors. But for the price, I should not have been surprised
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay but like okayyyyyy
customer_reviews.text: So I got this for my college apartment. Didn’t expect a miracle for $30 but I gambled anyway. Looks cheapy, feels cheaper, but it sucks like a mofo. I went around on rugs, carpet, vinyl, tile, literally every surface possible. I even went on the couch (leather?). It worked so much better than I expected. Like, I’m extremely impressed. If this thing breaks every year I would still replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Stolzer

customer_reviews.title: Very little suction.
customer_reviews.text: I decided to purchase it after reading the reviews. I am disappointed with this product. I'm giving it 2 stars because it is extremely lightweight, however, the suction is horrible! 90% of my house is hardwood and ceramic tile, with a few area rugs. It picked up nothing from the area rugs and only picked up a few crumbs from the kitchen, the dust and dirt you bring in off your shoes were still there as I could feel it when walking barefoot. I am better off going back to sweeping.
customer_reviews.author: Malinda Moore

customer_reviews.title: Nice color
customer_reviews.text: I have two little carpets at the entrance that are like indoor outdoor carpets and I didn't want to have to lug my big vacuum cleaner to just vacuum those two little rugs, So that's why I purchased the Bissell Featherweight and it's a total waste of money, doesn't pick up, it's worthless!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: The suction on this vacuum is way better. It's a cute lime green and it arrived ...
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is WOW! No really, I've had other brands that don't even compare. The suction on this vacuum is way better. It's a cute lime green and it arrived as described. If I could only add another 12' of cord, it would be 5 stars and I could vacuum a large portion of my home without changing outlets. Nice job Bissell, you get major props from me. I use this in between my real vacuuming job to pick up dog hairs.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Laughing husband proved wrong!
customer_reviews.text: First thing my husband said when I showed him, “It probably won’t work. You said it was $30? You’re going to get what you pay for. *lol*.” After I used it for two minutes on our new (one month old) vinyl flooring, “😳It picked up all that?! That’s more than I get when I sweep!” It picked up cat hair and my long hair no problem. Even more than my Hoover Pet Rewind does. Super freaking lightweight. I vacuumed the stairs (wooden) in two minutes too. Fastest I’ve ever cleaned them! I love this thing!!! Definitely needs to be emptied every time, and don’t forget to give the filter a few good taps to knock off the extra stuff. 😍👍
customer_reviews.author: MamaLisa

customer_reviews.title: Weak
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum failed to pick up a light covering of dust. After doing a little repairing, some dust fell on our rug, and this product failed to clean a small area. I had to drag out the old large vacuum to do the job. I am not sure why it gets such strong reviews from others. Also, the cord is relatively short. All in all, I would recommend that you find a different product.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I’ve made to this day. This vacuum is so amazing. My whole bottom floor is hard floors and I was so tired of sweeping them. I saw this and wanted to give it a try. It’s perfect for hard floors. I’m done vacuuming in about 5 minutes. I have 2 aussies and they shed A LOT. I can finally keep up with picking up their hair! It has 3 different configurations you can use, which I switch up often. I use this vacuum on my floors, couches, and to clean my car with the different configurations and it makes it super convenient. It’s light weight, has great suction, and makes a chore less miserable.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Overall amazing value
customer_reviews.text: A great little vacuum for quick clean ups! I bought it for use between major vacuumings with a full size vacuum. It does what I hoped it would and does it well! I have both low pile carpet and hard flooring and this vacuum picks up cat hair and litter quite easily. It’s so lightweight and relatively quiet as well. I would give this vacuum 10 stars if possible if they only made a bagged version of it. (I don’t like bagless vacuums due to the dust and dirt released when emptying.) Overall a great value and a great vacuum for its intended use!
customer_reviews.author: DSoCal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This is actually lighter in weight than I anticipated, but that's a great thing! It's the perfect size for quick clean ups and for cleaning my hardwood stairs. So much easier than dragging out my big full size vacuum. I have a kitten and it picks up his hair and litter easily. Can't beat the price, especially for a reputable brand like Bissell. Love this.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Light yet strong
customer_reviews.text: HIGHLY RECOMMEND FOR PET OWNERS!! I was skeptical about this product, I just bought a brand new Hoover vacuum that was just too bulky to be lugging up and down the house and my dogs spend the majority of their time in the kitchen/dining room. I decided, for the price, I might as well give it a shot since it beats sweeping seven to ten times a day!! This thing is amazing, the suction power is intense, it is lightweight and easy to carry around, it can be adjusted to be used as a handheld vacuum or a stick vacuum. It's a life saver and its such a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Castro

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little vacuum for hard surfaces
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to help keep clean my main living areas which are all hard surface flooring. I was sweeping prior to receiving this vacuum which is not very successful in comparison. This vacuum does a great job at picking up crumbs, hair and lint. I have a few 'scatter rugs' that are low pile and I have ran it over them as well. Not a vacuum for carpets but great on hard surfaces and an occasional rug. Def recommend especially after seeing the price of this model compared to others. In addition, the size is perfect for storage, the weight is literally 'feather' like and cleaning it couldn't be any simpler. Seriously. Get one.
customer_reviews.author: tomsorders

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum for the price. Assembly is a breeze. Cord was plenty long enough. Lightweight so it is easy to move and store. I mainly bought it for my rugs but I also use it on our hard wood floors and it does a pretty good job there too. You do have to make slower passes for it to pick up every little speck, but it’s not a Dyson. It works exactly like a $20 vacuum should. The noise level for this vacuum is on the low side of the scale so if you’ve got a noise sensitive person to keep in mind this should not trigger them.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Young

customer_reviews.title: Great price, light yet powerful, but potential quality issues
customer_reviews.text: I was going to rate this vacuum highly because it's so light and powerful I can now use it all the time and keep my apt clean. But I just noticed the pattern of discoloration (shown in the photo) that might eventually lead to cracking ? I believe this is due to the high heat emitted by the powerful motor if used for an extended period of time. It's still a great buy for the price, and I never expected it to last a long time, but watch out for overheating. Also, it's been already been noted by other reviewers that you can't buy a replacement filter.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Works so well instead of sweeping hardwood floor!
customer_reviews.text: Works better than sweeping for hardwood floors! To try it out, I swept my hardwood floors, then went back over it with this vacuum - it picked up dust from the floor that my broom couldn't. Through the next couple weeks, I only used this vacuum and my floors have never been cleaner. They shine even before I mop. My main messes that this vacuum is cleaning for me: little pieces of food that drop in the kitchen and dining room, scattered bird seeds and cockatiel feathers "dust" from my cockatiel, rabbit hair and little bits of hay from my rabbit. Super light weight, very quick and easy to use, great suction!
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: GREAT buy for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, light weight vacuum for those who are on a budget. Perfect for my one bedroom apartment. Works on my shag rug and hardwood floor and gets human and dog hair off the floor/carpet very easily. Can detach and turn into a handheld with attachment that is great for getting dirt out of crevices in furniture, etc. I also used this feature to clean the dog hair off of the mats in my car. Only downside is it is not cordless, but you get what you pay for, and it's worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Vijay Murthy

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as a $25 vacuum ought to
customer_reviews.text: I mean, it's $25 so the fact that it doesn't really work on my shag carpet is not really a surprise (It does to a certain extent but takes a lot of work and won't get everything). But I hate sweeping and this works awesomely on hardwood floors. Great for cleaning up small dry messes like the kitty litter my cat kicks all over the place, hair and dust bunnies. As long as you're not expecting the performance of a higher range, $100+ vacuum, then I think you will be pleased.
customer_reviews.author: michael garver

customer_reviews.title: Amazing lil vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love this lil vacuum i got it mainly for my cats room they are terrified of my bigger vacuum this is amazing it picks up cat litter & fur really good i do run over the area rug a few times but it is perfect on the laminate floor in their i love how its 3 in 1 different sizes u can convert it to for different things to vacuum & filter is so easy to clean off everytime i use it which is 2x wk
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: works well on any surface
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Bissell for quick cleanups but found it has more power than I expected plus it can get into tight spots like corners, under counters, tables and chairs plus inside closets and pantry. And because it's so light, you just carry it from room to room. I use a heavy duty Shark for main vacuuming but it has it's limitations as mentioned above.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H

customer_reviews.title: Good and bad
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and how there are different ways it can be used. We only have two rugs in the house so I figured a small vacuum is all we would need. My daughter has a fuzzy rug that it does not work on. My son has a thin rug that it works wonderfully on. I tried it on my hardwood floors and it picks up the hair from my daughter and I and dust. I did notice though that it does seem to leave behind some dirt and more so pushes it around.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna K.

customer_reviews.title: very disapointed!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in the end of Oct..worked fine. Now the filter is NOT catching the hair, it is going past the original filter and straight through the machine, too late to exchange it, or do anything about it!! Really good item when I first got it, now I guess it's garbage!!
customer_reviews.author: Gayle E. Walker

customer_reviews.title: I am impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Five weeks into lockdown inside a dusty, one bedroom apartment without housekeeping service for almost three weeks. I ordered this stick vacuum in desperation to keep my allergy at bay. Wow, what a little sucking machine this stick vacuum is! I ran it over my carpeted livingroom and bedroom, and the kitchen, bathroom and hallway hardwood floors. Guess what? I was astonished by the big clump of dirt and hair I had to empty into my trash can. Now I can at least being imprisoned inside a much cleaner home!
customer_reviews.author: Sensitive

customer_reviews.title: Not Much "Bang" For Your Buck
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a small vacuum for my studio apartment. Unfortunately, it really doesn't seem to do the job it needs to. Whenever I use it I still just feel like the carpet is still dirty, and it takes a lot of pressure and pushing to get it to snag up even the smallest bits. It's great on the floor, however! In the foyer and kitchen, it works fantastically. It's just the carpet that it struggles with. It isn't much "bang" for your buck, which is sad considering how cheap it was. I suggest skipping it entirely and just going with a more expensive model. If you're using it on tile/linoleum, it's much better suited.
customer_reviews.author: D.S.

customer_reviews.title: short cord, but good vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty powerful vacuum, although with larger items (like a Cheerio), you gotta do a little Hungry Hungry Hippo action and kinda lift up the head of the vacuum. But I can live with that. If only the cord were a bit longer! But, I use it to pick up the constant food that the pigs I live with drop all around the kitchen island. ;)
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: It’s an OK vacuum. A little disappointed with suction power. It’s not great on stairs but better on bare floors definitely not made for vacuuming carpets.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Clifton

customer_reviews.title: It's a great $30 Vacuum - Exactly that
customer_reviews.text: All the reviews that complain about features and size are silly - YOU PAID $30 FOR THE VACUUM! WHAT DID YOU EXPECT? It's a great lightweight quick clean up vacuum, definitely not for large areas or deep cleaning but perfect for daily clean up of tracked kitty litter or a quick clean up of spilled dry items. Very light weight so it's on great stairs or when you want to dust off curtains, etc. No, it's not the most powerful, large capacity vacuum ---> it's a great $30 dollar light clean up vacuum though.
customer_reviews.author: SLR

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use, gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this vacuum. My dyson broke. This price was great, I love how easy it is to use. I don’t avoid vacuuming because it’s so easy to grab out of the closet, very light and portable, almost fun to use?! I like the detachment feature for vacuuming the couch. Sucks up a lot of dirt and dust. I took a star off because I feel the chord is a little too short and I wish the suction was a little stronger, but it sucks up the dust bunnies - what I’m mostly concerned about when using this vaccuum - without having to really worry about sucking up barrettes or coins.
customer_reviews.author: julia

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy unless it is for a young child to keep in their room to use.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking at cordless stick vacuums with extension sticks to clean top mounding drapes ect.., this is neither..it is electric & basically a cheap heavy Dustbuster. Incredibly flimsy almost toy like, instructions do not include info on adapters therefore it’s difficult to know if everything is as intended. It was my fault for not reading description before ordering so I chose not to return, I will give to my 5 yo granddaughter to motive her keeping room clean
customer_reviews.author: SMP

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: that picture is real life - first time emptying it. the best $30 i have ever spent in my entire adulthood. it’s so light i even let my toddler vacuum at times. i have hardwood floors, and a super thin rug - i probably would t recommend it for thick carpets. tile/wood flooring seems best. order this and throw the broom away.
customer_reviews.author: Sammi J

customer_reviews.title: Great little sucker
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife. For the price it works way better than wireless vacuums twice or 3 times the price. If wireless is that important, then go for that. But this works really well for small things and vacuuming around on hardwood. Also use it for sucking up hair from haircuts at home.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: This is more for crumbs only
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work that great. I'm upset with the purchase. The container is so small that it doesn't hold much more than dust. I have to empty and clean the filter 3 times just to finish the floor. I have birds and thought this would be a good choice to clean up their feathers and food that falls, but not so much. Doesn't even work as good as a dust buster which this one can turn into one. This vacuum is only good for dust. Barely does matts in the hallways and kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Tara B.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. I have no pets and only two area rugs and still hate this product. It takes me a good 20 mins to vacuum because I have to run it over the same spot about 20 times!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for hardwood and tile floors.
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum (you know you're getting old when you love a vacuum). Its great on our hardwood floors and tile. So easy to use on the steps because it's so lightweight. Easy to empty the dirt. Doesn't do a great job at getting hair off carpet but for the low price you can't beat it for everything else.
customer_reviews.author: kristin

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son’s play area so I don’t have to get the big heavy vacuum out every time. Well my son loves it lol but it’s not so great . It has no suction for even a little mess so I’m keeping it and letting him play with it.
customer_reviews.author: LOLA

customer_reviews.title: Don’t judge the suck by the size!
customer_reviews.text: This little vac has a good suck 😂. Keeping the price in mind, it did it’s job on my apartment carpet. It takes a while to vacuum bc it’s so small...but ya know, for us who have more time than money..solid purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this vacuum because we have 3 dogs in my house. I got tired of lugging the huge family vacuum around so I decided on this, its small enough to keep tucked away in my closet! The filter is reusable too, you can easily shake it off or rinse it off. It does a pretty good job at picking up the dog hair but it definitely doesnt replace the big vacuum (power wise). I use it to keep the fur from getting out of hand in my room and it works fine but it doesnt do a good job if you want to use any carpet powders, it doesnt pick that up completely. Its also super lightweight!
customer_reviews.author: Dog_Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good vacuum for price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent lightweight vacuum for the price, it does it job, and I got quite a bit of dust and dirt out of my carpet so it’s worth the $29.99. If you have more money, get a more expensive vacuum cause you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Gizmo

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I have a larger vacuum but hate the hassle of dragging it out, so I purchased this small one to keep around the cat litter boxes for quick daily cleanup. It is super small and lightweight, and is great for small mess cleanup. It catches cat hair and cat litter with no problem. My only complaint is that changing the head direction while vacuuming isn’t super smooth, but for the price and intended use that’s hardly a REAL problem. I have a rechargeable handheld vaccuum similar to this one and prefer the suction power of this corded one. I would buy again and recommend to anyone who wants something light and functional for every day mess cleanup
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Amazon doesn't sell the filters. You might as well buy from Bissell Direct
customer_reviews.text: It's a great little vacuum. We all have different models and we love them. We loved them even more when we could buy replacement filters from Amazon, but for some reason, they aren't available for the newer models (2030, 2033). If you want replacement filters, you have to call Bissell and spend $40+ to get free shipping, whether you buy the special "Walmart 2030 model" or the regular 2033 model. (BTW, the filters for these two aren't interchangeable). So if you want the vacuum, you should spend the same amount and include the vac filters and the little sponge filter all at the same time for free shipping. I wish I had.
customer_reviews.author: maggiedot

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: We have inside dogs & part of the house is linoleum floors. Sweeping doesn't get all the hair & dust. Even my Dyson doesn't get everything. This is perfect! No more sweeping! No roller brush to get gunked up & it is so lightweight. I used an older version of this same unit when I lived in a very sandy area & keeping it off the floors was a losing battle until I got this. I 100% recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: S. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Great little floor vacuum but could use some improvements
customer_reviews.text: Sucks a lot more than you would think and is great for quick clean ups and picking up a pile of dust and dirt you don't want to sweep into a tray, yuck! However, the cord is short -- I'm always replugging it into another outlet to finish a room or a hallway. It topples over easily. And I am skeptical of all the air that it blows out while turned on. I'm kind of a dust freak and just wonder if it's gushing dust back into my room after sucking it up. All in all, it picks junk up off the floor which is what I need it to do, so I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Great on hard surfaces, not for carpet
customer_reviews.text: It picks up dust and dirt really well. Gets clogged pretty easily if you run it over scraps of paper (been taking down wallpaper and have scraps everywhere that a broom didn't get), but it's quick and easy to clean it out. Not great at picking up much of anything from carpet (doesn't roll over it too easily) but for the 90% of my floors that are hard surface, this was a great solution after my vacuum cleaner broke and I needed a cheap, quick fix.
customer_reviews.author: jim mckinney

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: I have used this several times now and it’s essentially a Dustbuster with a handle. The wheels are stiff and it doesn’t really roll - just slides across the floor. Also, I have to be careful after I turn it off or some of the dirt will fall back out before I get it to the trash to empty the filter. It’s just an ok item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It did not disappoint!
customer_reviews.text: This little vacuum rocks! For the price , you can’t beat it. It’s powerful and extremely light weight. The cord is long and it’s overall just perfect for the laminate flooring in my house! No more sweeping! I will say it doesn’t pick up large objects like a normal heavier duty vacuum would but it does the job for small things (crumbs, dust, dry cat food, even litter spilled out into the ground by my kitty)
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: I use this vacuum everyday in my kitchen that has tile, I have two German Shepards and they pretty much shed hair every step they take. Before this I was spending about 20 minutes each day sweeping multiple times just to try and get all the hair on the kitchen floor, and with it being tile and have grout lines it was a nightmare. But ever since I got this, I simply just do one quick round around the kitchen and am done within maybe 3 minutes! I love this thing! It does not work on carpet but I never would have expected it to, but pretty much I have done away with my broom and dustpan.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Wow, Super Light Weight and Unequaled Performance for $35!
customer_reviews.text: This little machine really works and it hasn't broken down! We've put it on a side to side comparison with another very expensive vac with a brand name starting with D and frankly could tell absolutely no difference in the cleaning result. Moreover, the D brand picked up nothing after we had run this vac beforehand. And $35? Good Grief, that's nothing for the performance of this vac. It does not appear to be particularly well made after taking it from the box, but who cares? It works and it doesn't break down after three uses. From our experience, we very highly recommend this vac.
customer_reviews.author: Velho

customer_reviews.title: Nice little dorm vacuum !
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my college student . They have tile floors and area rugs . She is in a quad so 4 girls are in 1 room with 1 bathroom . If you have girls you will understand that the amount of hair everywhere is crazy . So far this little vacuum works well and aside from sweeping helps keep their dorm clean . Needed something lightweight and portable. This works for their needs !
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed for frequent hard surface 'dusting'
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for something very light for hard surfaces to pick up dog hair (Labrador), dust, grass tracked in from outside. I hate manual sweeping. Tired of my heavy Hoover which is cumbersome even though it is great for deep cleaning. This is exactly as advertised and doesn't break my back. Beware this is very light, filter is heavy paper and seems fragile. (I've already figured out how to rig up another filter if needed) I've used it on sofas, stairs, carpet and it does a light clean; gets most of the dog hair. I have used it 3X per week for a month and it is a godsend. If it breaks I will order another.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Not very impressed with the vacuum cleaner I didn’t pay that much for work so I guess you get what you pay for I gave it a one on hardwood floors I do not have them so I don’t know that it works good on the hardwood. I do know they don’t work very well for carpet and rugs. Very disappointed and bissel they are not in for quality products but I think they failed on this one in my Opinion.
customer_reviews.author: R Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace one similar (same brand) that I had had maybe 12-15 years. I have all hard wood floors and multiple hairy pets so I need something for quick cleaning. Pros: light, nice color options, suction seems good, price. Cons: feels cheaply made, rattles like its cheaply made when pushing/pulling it, after 2nd use the handle part is lose and wiggles (maybe i can screw it tighter??), cord is stupidly short. Overall: for the price it's good however I was very tempted to return it over how short the cord is. I have to plug it in 3 different places just to get my whole livingroom and it's not a big room.
customer_reviews.author: Meda

customer_reviews.title: Not for Dusty Environments
customer_reviews.text: I concur that this vacuum isn't the best. I have been able to very comfortably and easily clean the filter; however, I am currently in a dusty environment, and the filter gets clogged almost instantly. To vacuum just a 100 square foot space, it takes probably 20 minutes just because I have to empty the vacuum and clean the filter roughly 5-6 times. It's a tough one to use. Maybe for small clean ups somewhere else, but this was a big swing and a miss for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping, because it was a bissell product, it was going to work well in my tiny home with no carpet. I was wrong. Not only is the suction bad, but cleaning it out is worse. It makes a terrible mess and doesn't come completely clean. I used it twice then tossed it outside.
customer_reviews.author: bizzi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, perfect, incredible, nothing more to say!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say this item is perfect!. So perfect that I purchased 5 of them. I ordered them for my sisters, grandparent, mom, aunt, and cousin. It is that good!. This vacuum picks up everything and gets the corners too. its super affordable and not an eye sore. Its small too so fits anywhere for storage purposes. I have been using this vacuum for 2 going on 3 years and is still going strong!
customer_reviews.author: sandra Mard

customer_reviews.title: Just OK for cat litter cleanup
customer_reviews.text: Got this to clean up cat litter tracked by my cats around their litter boxes. Does pretty well at hardwood floor cleanup but just alright on cat litter mates vacuuming - have to keep going over the same spot to try to trick the kernels to get airborne enough to be sucked up by the vacuum. Need to empty & smack around the filter regularly to keep suction up. For what it does, probably worth the price given brooms with dust pans aren't much more. But still I'm looking forward to replacing my normal old vacuum with a newer one, and transitioning the old one to be the cat litter one...
customer_reviews.author: lyst

customer_reviews.title: Nice little vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Great little vacuum with great suction. I wanted something light weight for the stairs and something that would go flat enough to get under our beds for pet hair and dust. It does all of that and then some. My only complaint is the cord is way too short. I can't plug it in upstairs and go any further than 5 of our 10 steps down and if I plug it in downstairs and work my way up it barely reaches same with our bedroom..I have to plug it in 3 different places to get the whole room (wonder why they made it so short)? Just a little inconvenient is all!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best little stick vacuum! It has done,an,expectional job of cleaning up my pet hair and other dirt. Its a game changer for those of you who have pets and hardwood/title floors. If your still sweeping your floors with a broom and dustpan. You will be pleasantly surprised how this will improve your cleaning time and its so lightweight! Simply perfect for even everyday use. Just wish I would have found it earlier. It does a great job picking up any sand/dirt/pet hair. Its great! Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best little light weight floor cleaner. I’ve gone through several where They never worked satisfactorily and I’d end up giving them away. This one works really well on both hardwood and my low pile carpet (Ruggable). Can’t beat the price. The cup is small and needs to be emptied after 1-2 uses but it’s so simple to do.
customer_reviews.author: Josie James

customer_reviews.title: Pet Fur...
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I recently replaced our carpet with laminate floors. It looks great, but I didn’t realize just how much FUR my pets shed. So much fur. It floats in the air... it collects under and around furniture in fluffy clumpy dust-kittens. It finds a home on my clothing. I mistakenly thought that a broom or a dusting mop (a s*iffer) would be enough to keep the floors clean. It totally isn’t enough. They just push the fur around. This little vacuum has enough suction to pick up the fur and the occasional LEGO. I’m glad I finally bought one. I bought the aqua model and it’s quite cute.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Sakes

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever
customer_reviews.text: I love it more than I imagined. I have hardwood floors and when I vacuum my floors, it blows air out the side and blows dust and hair all over the place, never even sucking it up. I gave the featherweight vacuum a try and it does not do that!!! It sucks it up right into the machine. No more sweeping or using a sucky vacuum anymore!!!! I am so happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Wood

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I got this after my cordless Shark kept breaking (Amazon replaced it three time 🤬). I have trouble with vacuums due to all the pet hair (one dog, two cats). I bought this because it was so cheap. If I have to replace a vacuum so much I don’t want to spend 300+ on it. This is very lightweight. It’s good for my hardwood/tile but I still use my trusty Dyson for the carpet. Overall good product for the price if you aren’t expecting a lot for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sara H.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE this vacuum cleaner  FIVE STARS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: First off I want to say I LOVE LOVE this vacuum cleaner!! I originally got it for a rug I have in my living room because I have all hardwood flooring/tile throughout my entire home. (3,200 sq ft) I was just needing it for this small amount of carpet. Now I use it throughout my entire home. I use it on my tile and hardwood flooring. This is a great vacuum for the money for sure. I love how you can detach the pieces to make it a hand held vacuum cleaner. I love how storage for this vacuum cleaner is so convenient. I put mine in a small closet area where I keep my brooms and mop. BUY THIS!!
customer_reviews.author: Mommaof3

customer_reviews.title: Takes the place of a high priced vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had found this before purchasing my Shark that broke. This picks up “everything” on my wooden floors & it does a quick clean on my kitchen rugs. This sucks debri much better than any other high priced vacuum I’ve owned. It’s light & easy to manage plus it’s versatility makes it a hit with me.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Lane

customer_reviews.title: The little guy roars
customer_reviews.text: WOW this is a great buy. It's a strong hand held vaccum AND you attach it and it becomes a regular vaccum. It is a solid A on hard wood floors and tiles and yet still works pretty well on carpets as well B+ All this at under $40..I am very pleased It is very light weight and took me all of 5 minutes to put together. Don't be fooled that itlooks cheap, it does exactly what it promises and no more lugging MR Heave Ho all around the house Buy it you won't be sorry Color me Happy and our house CLEANED Kally
customer_reviews.author: Kally

customer_reviews.title: Great lil vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I live in a studio apt with some carpet and some hardwood - very little storage space. Not only is this vacuum easy to store but, I really was very surprised by how good this works! I love it more than the regular vacuum I used to have b/c there are no brushes to pull hair and lint out of! The suction is great, the flexibility is great, love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum doesn’t work at all. I was wondering why it didn’t seem to do anything and I went to feel the suction and it’s practically non existent. I would recommend to spend a little more money and buy a better one. I wish I did.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST VACCUMM!
customer_reviews.text: Why waste $100 on a vaccum these days!? This three in one vaccum does all the job you need for your home! I was very amazed how well it cleaned hair, cereal spills and so on! I love the idea of how it has type methods of how to use, wether by hand or just like regular vaccum cleaner. It can also be used for your car! (If you have a 12v outlet that is, dont say I didnt mention. I really recommend this for people who dont want to spend a lot and like to keep their house/apartment/car/ clean at all times! BUY IT! YOU WON’T REGRET IT!
customer_reviews.author: Orlando

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hardwood floors!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this vacuum for my hardwood floors. Makes life easier, especially in the kitchen. Has great suction power! I’ve bought 2 already. It does work on my bathroom area rug but it can’t replace a large vacuum on high pile carpets.
customer_reviews.author: Sara M.

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: This thing was inexpensive and works as expected. My rechargeable stick finally died, so I bought this to try because I only have a 6x9 throw rug (all hardwood throughout). It does suck up your regular weekly lint and what not. Sometimes you have to go over and over the same area to get everything. It would probably be a good little vacuum to keep in a camper. Definitely don't buy this if you have actual wall to wall carpet. Since it's lightweight and adjustable, it also makes a great play vacuum for kids.
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Graves

customer_reviews.title: Handy cleanup
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine because my daughter-in-law has one and loved it. Happy to have mine now too. If I have any complaints it would be it needs a longer cord. I'm constantly having to look for a new plug as I move along while cleaning. And I use it everywhere, hard floors, stairs and light area rugs. I also like the feature that it can be used as a hand vac as well. We have 2 dogs so there is always a certain amount of hair along the way. Its fairly easy to clean too. Also, maybe the crevice tool could be a bit smaller at the end. I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: richard feeley

customer_reviews.title: The only thing this is good for is playing house
customer_reviews.text: The only thing this is good for is playing house. Spend a little more money and buy something that actually has some power.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Built for Carpet
customer_reviews.text: After noticing strands of hair in my carpet (no pets), I realized that this vacuum is not built for carpet, maybe just hardwood or small areas where dirt may reside. I mainly got this vacuum for my bedroom because it is the only thing that's carpet in my house. It does pick up dirt, but just above the surface. It isn't strong enough to handle carpet hair. There's no brush underneath it. It's just a light suction vacuum. I may only use this for little dirt pick ups but not my carpet. Guess it's time to buy a better vacuum 🙄
customer_reviews.author: Kou L.

customer_reviews.title: Useful and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Joy! Finally found a replacement for my ancient Regina electric broom! This works like a champ and the amount of pull/suction it has it surprises me at times. With two dogs and three cats and nothing but hardwood and tile floors, this little vacuum is my go-to on busy or lazy days. I hope Bissell is listening to everyone that says this vacuum needs a longer cord because it does. As it is, I use an extension cord when needed otherwise I am very, very happy with this purchase and will be buying more in the future for family members.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs McC

customer_reviews.title: Great for stray dog hair
customer_reviews.text: We put a hardwood like waterproof floor in our bathroom when we remolded it, we have a yellow lab and although I used a swiffer mop on the floor there were always hair that it missed. I saw this it was fairly inexpensive so I thought I'd give it a try. It worked bettter than I expected, now the capacity that it collects fills up fast , but its easy to empty and use again. After I'm done I wash out the filter and let it dry out before putting it back together. It also does a great job of getting hair off the stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Eshbach

customer_reviews.title: Best thirty dollars I ever spent
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for concrete and hardwood floors and rugs. It weighs nothing. Fits in a tiny storage place. Filter washes easily and dries quickly. It’s up there with DVR and on line banking in the ‘changed my life’ category.
customer_reviews.author: julie criner

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: BUY IT!!! So firat of all! Its so so lightweight! I pulled it out the box thinking it was a kids toy. Even though i read the other reviews i was quiet skeptical. I thought to myself, this tiny thing could never!!! So i decided to try it on our living room rug. I couldnt belive how much hair and dust this thing picked up!! It was amazing, and also for the price, you cant beat that. I was pretty Shooketh! Awsome buy!
customer_reviews.author: Nita

customer_reviews.title: Noooo
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I have a small carpeted area upstairs in my home. I wanted something small and light to carry upstairs but with good suction power to get the job done. It is very light weight and a great size. That is why I am giving it 2 stars. That and the color is nice. However the suction is horrible. It doesn’t catch any trash whatsoever on my floor. I got this because the reviews saying though it’s small and good priced it’s very good at sucking up trash! It’s not!! Don’t purchase this!
customer_reviews.author: Halie

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is great for hardwood floors! It actually does grab some stuff off of a low pile rug, but it is not really meant for that, so that is just a bonus. It is super light and the short(ish) cord is super manageable, so I find myself happily grabbing this very frequently to help keep the hardwood clean. It does very nicely on wood stairs, especially if you take the handle off. It isn't too loud and it is easy to empty. Overall, very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MB Johnson

customer_reviews.title: A lot of cleaning power at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this vacuum to use in a small studio apartment where a pricey vacuum would have been overkill. I am very happy with the quality for the price. There is a small filtering cup that is included. It fills very fasts. It is not a filter needed for heavy duty vacuum jobs, but it is perfect for my small studio (carpets and hardwood floors). And I am happy with the ability to break the stick down into smaller pieces for a variety of chores..... it's perfect. An excellent price for a whole lot of cleaning power. Also the perfect size for storing in limited space.
customer_reviews.author: Denny Cormier

customer_reviews.title: Terrific for the money
customer_reviews.text: My sister bought a Dyson for 10 times what this cost. The Bissell works well for my purposes (mostly cat hair). I made the right choice. I like how it stands upright when you're not using it, and you don't have to have it plugged into an outlet to charge. (Who has an outlet in their closet? Not me). Only complaint is that the cord is a little short - about 15 feet. I keep an extension cord on it and I'm good. Super light weight. Easy to clean. 4 stars due to the short cord.
customer_reviews.author: heylesley

customer_reviews.title: Build for a Barbie maybe
customer_reviews.text: I returned this joker with the quickness. Someone else said in their review that it’s similar to a toy vacuum cleaner. Seriously, it is. I was looking for an easy, lightweight vacuum cleaner for my 1 bedroom apartment, saw this and thought I found it. Not even! It’s definitely light weight and easy to put together but it didn’t pick up ANYTHING. I literally watched the same piece of small cotton from my dog’s toy just watch me as I vacuumed it over and over again. It was ridiculous. Sent it back one day after 1 use. Would not recommend at all!
customer_reviews.author: LadyDay

customer_reviews.title: I was sceptical. OMG I want another one GREAT PRODUCT🤗
customer_reviews.text: Pros it's super light weight, it was delivered put it together in mins , used it on my kitchen floor that my hubby had been in and out of all day," hubby has a aversion to wiping he's feet" , it cleaned my base boards my rubber rug just inside the door " that my broom won't" ,so quiet my 3 dogs didn't run for the couch bought it for our RV might buy one for the house. Con the trash cup is small, but easy to empty. Can I trade my hubby in for another one. Oh then I wouldn't need another one.🤭 Wife of a messy man and 3 dogs. It picked up everything. OMG buy buy buy.
customer_reviews.author: Keith H.

customer_reviews.title: More powerful than I thought!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I hate vacuuming my stairs! I already have a stand up Bissell with attachments but it’s not easy carrying it on the stairs while I vacuumed so I ordered this Bissell. Didn’t realize how much dog hair was on the steps but look at this!!! Did the job and was better than expected! Now I’ll do my stairs more often! Highly recommend. And it will work good for my car too!
customer_reviews.author: Jami

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful small vacuum cleaner for use on floors that are not carpeted. I also like that the handle comes off so that I can clean my car with it as well. I like this so much that I bought another one for my sister, because it is very light and easy to use for people with arthritis.
customer_reviews.author: CUshopping

customer_reviews.title: Nice little vacuum, compact
customer_reviews.text: Very nice lightweight vacuum, I use it instead of sweeping, picks up mostly small messes and just like broom. Suction is nice as long as u keep it clean, some larger items I just pick up the vacuum and put it over and it picks up too like nuts. Handle is comfortable height for me I'm 5,4.
customer_reviews.author: My life's garden

customer_reviews.title: No more excusses for a dirty floor
customer_reviews.text: Love this little electric vacuum. I use it on bare floors, low pile area rugs and furniture. It's great for everyday cleaning and quick mess cleanup. I've gone thru every brand of chargeable vacuums and have been disappointed with all of them. This little guy has the convenience of the portable with the suction of an electric and a handle for bigger jobs and a corner attachment for those tight spots. Yeah, it has a little 'bag' and has to be emptied often. But that's easy to do. And it can be rinsed out and/or replaced. My big expensive, heavy K can sit in the closet indefinitely.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Greenwell

customer_reviews.title: Decent for small areas
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum works well for dust and crumbs and I highly recommend buying it to clean around something like a hamster cage but it does not suck up long hair. I have very long hair and should have taken this into consideration but it completely ignores them so, yes it mostly cleans the house, except for my annoying hairs... On the bright side, I like the convenience of getting hard to reach places by using the hand-held option.
customer_reviews.author: Carrinabee

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully Made
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum! Its really lightweight, I can vacuum my carpet, my kitchen floor, all very versatile and very easy to switch between hand vacuum, handle, crevice tool and floor attachment. I was able to use it to clean dirt off my floor after repotting some plants inside. Its so easy to get the dust off my baseboards now.. also easy to clean out.. I was also able to pick up salt, flour and sugar where my larger shark vacuum was not able to get all the little bits. The only thing that could be better is a longer cord.
customer_reviews.author: KinsReader

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for wood flooring with pet hair and kitty litter.
customer_reviews.text: Love love love. I have wood floors throughout my apartment except the bedroom. It’s perfect for the wood floors. I have 2 cats and it’s great for vacuuming the wood floors with all of the cat hair and kitty litter. I disagree with anyone who says it doesn’t have good suction a it doesn’t pick up the kitty litter. Maybe they have carpet. This vacuum does do great on my area rugs but it’s not meant to do a fully carpeted floor. I use a different vacuum for that. So glad I found this light weight one.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: It's okay but you can get the same thing for a little less if you look around here
customer_reviews.text: I thought if I bought the Bissell it would be better than the dirt devil but it's the same exact thing and it's 33 to 50% more money. And it works no better it's a matter of fact it's the same exact thing different color. That said the dirt devil work pretty good it's just not a vacuum cleaner so if you're going to use it to vacuum carpets you're going to have quite a workout even though the device is not heavy.if I knew that it was no better than the dirt devil I would have bought the dirt devil.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID

customer_reviews.title: Works like a dream
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a heavy-duty vacuum at my office because the one there was from the 90s and gave me a headache every time it was turned on. This little guy is super light and has great suction and works perfectly on low carpet and hard floors. The cord is not very long, but that's a pretty easy problem to solve. I will say that if you have an aversion to insects and some end up falling victim to your cleaning venture that you should have your husband or least favorite child empty the chamber out for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Wilkerson

product_meta.title: Bissell Featherweight Stick Lightweight Bagless Vacuum, 2033, One Size Fits All, Blue
product_meta.description: Color:Blue| Style:FeatherweightColor: Blue The Featherweight lightweight stick vacuum gives you convenient and effective cleaning on carpets, area rugs, bare floors, stairs, upholstery and more it easily converts from a stick vacuum to a hand vacuum to clean anywhere in your home. Because the featherweight is ultra-lightweight and compact it is easy to use and easy to store. Power source - corded. Power rating-2 Amps.
feature_bullets: Powerful, convenient, and easy to use
Powerful suction makes it great for quick pick ups with multipurpose versatility
Versatile cleaning three machines in one: A stick vacuum, handle vacuum, and stair vacuum
With a crevice tool for furniture and a floor nozzle for stairs
Clean hard floors and surface dirt on carpets and area rugs. Surface type: Counter tops, sealed hard floors, low pile carpet. Dirt cup capacity: 0.67 liter

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars13,506 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
